name: Sub-zero Blade
effects: Remove all effects from one enemy
Reduce ATK by 45% for 3 turns to one enemy

desc_short: Remove all status effects and reduce ATK for one enemy

desc_long: Removes all status effects and reduces ATK for one enemy.
解除1名敵人的狀態效果，並降低其攻擊的數值。
적 1명의 상태 변화를 해제하고, 공격력을 감소시킵니다.
